text: Margot Llobera Farré (born 18 May 1996) is an Andorran footballer who plays as a defender. She has been a member of the Andorra women's national team. She also participated as motorbiker at the 2019 FIM Bajas World Cup during the Baja Aragón. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Andorran women's footballers Category:Andorra women's international footballers Category:Female motorcycle racers
title: Margot Llobera
